original_text: When Shishak king of Egypt attacked Jerusalem, he carried off the treasures of the temple of the Lord and the treasures of the royal palace. He took everything, including the gold shields Solomon had made.
korean_text: 애굽 왕 시삭이 올라와서 예루살렘을 치고 여호와의 전 보물과 왕궁의 보물을 모두 빼앗고 솔로몬이 만든 금 방패도 빼앗은지라

sentences.original_text: When Shishak king of Egypt attacked Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 공격했을 때

sentences.original_text: he carried off the treasures of the temple of the Lord
and the treasures of the royal palace
including the gold shields Solomon had made
